---
title: "About"
---

I graduated from the University of Wyoming in 2011 with degrees in Geography and Anthropology. In 2022, I received my Ph.D. from [Columbia University](https://e3b.columbia.edu/) in ecology and environmental biology, working with [Dr. Maria Uriarte](https://uriartelab.org/). Currently, I am a Postdoctoral Associate at the [Cary Institute of Ecosystem Studies](https://www.caryinstitute.org/) working with [Dr. Winslow D. Hansen](https://forestfutureslab.org/).
